dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, so I was just reading about this incredible, uh, city. It sounds absolutely stunning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, so I was just reading about this incredible, uh, city. It sounds absolutely stunning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? [interrupts] What's got you so excited, A? Spill the tea!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's got you so excited, A? Spill the tea!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so picture this: old-world stone streets, right? And then, like, this huge limestone mountain behind it with incredible views.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so picture this: old-world stone streets, right? And then, like, this huge limestone mountain behind it with incredible views.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, sounds pretty picturesque. Can you actually *do* anything with the mountain? Or is it just, uh, for looking at?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, sounds pretty picturesque. Can you actually do anything with the mountain? Or is it just, uh, for looking at?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the cool part! The article says you can climb it with relative ease, actually, thanks to all these extensive castle walls that sort of, um, snake up from the city. They lead right up to some castle remains at the top.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the cool part! The article says you can climb it with relative ease, actually, thanks to all these extensive castle walls that sort of, um, snake up from the city. They lead right up to some castle remains at the top.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that sounds amazing. So how do people even get to this, uh, charming place? Is it, like, a hidden gem?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that sounds amazing. So how do people even get to this, uh, charming place? Is it, like, a hidden gem?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, the writer arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, which a lot of people do. But then they also mentioned that most people, surprisingly, seem to arrive by boat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, the writer arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, which a lot of people do. But then they also mentioned that most people, surprisingly, seem to arrive by boat.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane. Most people, it seems, arrive by boat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] By boat?! That sounds way more dramatic! Like you're sailing into a secret fjord or something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: By boat?! That sounds way more dramatic! Like you're sailing into a secret fjord or something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Totally! But the main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city itself. Not as elaborate as Dubrovnik, they said, but it definitely has its own charm.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Totally! But the main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city itself. Not as elaborate as Dubrovnik, they said, but it definitely has its own charm.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city. Not as elaborate or extensive as Dubrovnik, it has its own charm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, a charming walled city. Any recommendations on, like, where to stay? Or, um, what to eat?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, a charming walled city. Any recommendations on, like, where to stay? Or, um, what to eat?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely! The writer raved about Hostel Old Town Kotor. Said the staff were lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, and the rooms were, like, incredible. Plus, it's super centrally located inside the walled city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely! The writer raved about Hostel Old Town Kotor. Said the staff were lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, and the rooms were, like, incredible. Plus, it's super centrally located inside the walled city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I stayed, and highly recommend, Hostel Old Town Kotor. The people who work there are lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, the rooms were incredible, and its central location inside the walled city is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, a hostel recommendation that good is pretty rare. What about the food outside the hostel? Were the restaurants, uh, up to snuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, a hostel recommendation that good is pretty rare. What about the food outside the hostel? Were the restaurants, uh, up to snuff?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they said restaurants abound, with a huge variety, you know? But, uh, they weren't *quite* as impressed with the food there as they were in nearby Mostar. So maybe it's not a culinary capital, but still good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they said restaurants abound, with a huge variety, you know? But, uh, they weren't quite as impressed with the food there as they were in nearby Mostar. So maybe it's not a culinary capital, but still good.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Restaurants abound, as youd expect, with a variety of cuisines. I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hmm, good to know. But still, the old-world charm, those views, the easy mountain climb... sounds like a must-visit, boat arrival optional!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hmm, good to know. But still, the old-world charm, those views, the easy mountain climb... sounds like a must-visit, boat arrival optional!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! I'm adding it to my list right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! I'm adding it to my list right now.
